Autorun.description: Press Y and you Run without pressing W

Auto Bandage Craft.description: Press C and you make yourself some bandages in a fight

Combat log.description: Open the combat log in the Console

Combat log filter: only your dmg.description: Show only the damage you deal

Suicide.description: Just Hotkey the Kill Command in the Console (Press END for Self kill)

AutoMine bind.description: Automatically use the attack action in conjunction with crouch

Automatically heal.description: Automatically use bandage or syringe in slot 6

Fast Switch to your Slot 4.description: Better Control over your Hot bar

Fast Switch to your Slot 5.description: Better Control over your Hot bar

Show Pop of the Server.description: Not on every server, only on community server

Sound to minimum.description: Reduces Game sound to minimum (for Boat driving, Recycling, Minicopter)

Memory leak fix.description: Press k to clear the memory to fix some FPS problems

Noclip for build server.description: Press h to fly only with admin right
